Analyte(s): Respiratory Syncytial Virus antigens (fusion protein or nucleoprotein)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for TRU RSV rapid lateral-flow immunoassay for detection of respiratory syncytial virus antigens in pediatric respiratory samples
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid qualitative lateral-flow immunoassay for detecting RSV antigens (fusion protein or nucleoprotein) in nasal wash, nasopharyngeal aspirate, and nasal/nasopharyngeal swabs from symptomatic patients aged 5 years or less; negative results should be confirmed by cell culture.
